suites.title: Change languages of the site.
suites.description: Change the languages of the site from the special button.

cases.title: Change the language from Bulgarian to Romanian on the main page.
cases.description: The site has an option to change the language from Bulgarian to Romanian.
cases.postconditions: The language of the main page is changed from Bulgarian to Romanian.

steps.action: Find the language menu located on the left side of the header and click on  “BG”.
steps.expected_result: The languages menu contains two languages “BG” and “RO”.
The language of the main page is changed from Bulgarian to Romanian.

cases.title: Change the language from Romanian to Bulgarian on the main page.
cases.description: The site has an option to change the language from Romanian to Bulgarian.
cases.preconditions: The main Bulgarian language of the site change to Romanian.
cases.postconditions: The language of the main page of the site changed from Romanian to Bulgarian.

steps.action: Click the first button on the left side of the header with the signature “RO” and click the other option with the signature “BG”.
steps.expected_result: The language of the main page of the site changed from Romanian to Bulgarian.
